title: T Cards Added to Web Site
author: Brailey

posts.post_title: T Cards Added to Web Site
posts.post_content:
Recently I added some cards to my for sale page and lowered prices on many of the others.  Here is the link:

[url]http://imageevent.com/brailey/cardsforsale[/url]

Please contact me at [url]mikebrailey@yahoo.com[/url] for purchases or if you have questions.

Currently listed T cards are: 
3 - T3's
31 - T205's
43 - T206's
13 - T207's
1 - T209
6 - T210's
3 - T212's
1 - T1213
1 - T222

And many other N, E, M and W type cards.

Thanks to all who bought from me over the past couple of weeks! I hope everyone is happy with their cards.

Mike Brailey
ebay ID: brails
